# Nav Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Pills

**Appearance Class:** `nav-pills`

---

## Appearance: Tabs

**Appearance Class:** `nav-tabs`

---

## Appearance: Pills-stacked

**Appearance Class:** `nav-pills nav-stacked`

---

## Appearance: Tabs-stacked

**Appearance Class:** `nav-tabs nav-stacked`

---

## Appearance: Pills-justified

**Appearance Class:** `nav-pills nav-justified`

---

## Appearance: Tabs-justified

**Appearance Class:** `nav-tabs nav-justified`
